mapper.insert: insert into item(id, title, content, price, location, itemcondition, status, wdate, likecount, filename, newfilename, delflg ) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{location}, #{itemcondition},0, now(), 0, #{filename}, #{newfilename}, 0 )
mapper.select:
select * from item where 1=1
and title like concat('%', #{search},'%')and delflg=0
and content like concat('%', #{search},'%')and delflg=0
and id=#{search} and delflg=0
order by wdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into itemlike(id, seq, liketime) values(#{id}, #{seq}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from itemlike where id=#{id} and seq=#{seq}
